code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"./car.css";import CategoriesNav from"../categoriesNav/categoriesNav";import{fetchData}from"../../Api/dataApi";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Car=()=>{const{t}=useTranslation();const[filteredData,setFilteredData]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const loadData=async()=>{try{const data=await fetchData("Cars");setFilteredData(data);}catch(err){setError(err.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};loadData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"car",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CategoriesNav,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"car-title",children:t("available_cars")}),loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:t("loading")}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:{color:"red"},children:[t("error_message"),": ",error]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"car-container",children:filteredData.map(car=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"car-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(car.id||car._id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Array.isArray(car.images)&&car.images.length>0?car.images[0]:t("no_image"),alt:car.title||t("no_name"),className:"car-image"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"car-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"car-name",children:car.title||t("no_name")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"car-description",children:car.description||t("no_description")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"car-price",children:[t("price"),": ",car.price||t("no_price")]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"car-location",children:[t("location"),": ",car.location||t("no_location")]})]})]},car.id||car._id))})]});};export default Car;
